scenario_text.value:
Hmm, if Saki is for her, I think I support
that woman, too.

What? Are you really going to make up your
mind that easily?

Well, to be honest, I don’t really care one
way or the other.

Don’t tell Saki, but personally, I don’t
trust the woman.

Because I’m her partner, and I don’t think we
should be disagreeing about things.
I’m not sure that’s how this works.

Anyway, it’s not like I have any reason for
my opinion.

One way or the other, can’t we just settle
this and move on?
